entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse So whats been stopping you for the first term of your presidency?? Hillary??? Obama?? Biden?? All the people you had to fire? Golf? Impeachment? Covid19? Civil unrest? Hurricane Maria? Flooding? Wildfires? Unemployment? Stock crash?  Maybe just your complete lack of competence.🙄
